text: For expression of the GST - tagged NS5A protein , the NS5A gene was subcloned into the pGEX - 6p - 1 vector ( catalog no . 28 - 9546 - 48 ; GE Healthcare , Piscataway , NJ , USA ) , creating pGEX - NS5A . The GST or GST - NS5A fusion protein expressed in E . coli BL21 ( DE3 ) were purified with the glutathione - Sepharose 4B resin ( catalog no . 10049253 ; GE Biosciences , Piscataway , NJ , USA ) according to the manufacturer ' s instructions .
